root.name: SEGA AGES 2500 Vol.1: Phantasy Star - Generation:1
root.description: A remake of the original Phantasy Star, the game was released in Japan on 28 June 2003.A fan translation of the game has been made available in 2012. It was translated by Kyence, and you can check out her translation here.
